msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (Maryam and Mariham); name of the Archangel Mikaʾel (fols. 11ra, 129rav); names of the commissioner and his family members; the word sälam "salutation" in Texts I-1 and I-3; directives for the ministers in Text I-1; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I (alternating with black lines), a few lines in the incipit of Text I-2 (alternating with black lines), initial line in the incipit of Texts I-3 and I-4, one or a few words of subsections of Texts I-1 and I-2, two initial lines of sections of Text I-4) and some subsection numbers (Text I-4a).

msItem.note: Text I-1, partly with interlineal musical notation (fol. 8ra-vb), contains:
- Ṣälotä [zä-yǝbǝl] ʾǝmqǝdmä [yanbǝbu] täʾamǝr lä-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝnä Maryam... “Prayer [recited] before [reading] the Miracles ...” (fol. 9ra).
It also contains indications for the reading of an excerpt from the Gospel of John (Jn. 19:25-27) (fol. 9ra) and the hymn Sälam lä-Maryam “Salutation for Mary” (fol. 9ra).
Further indications for reading the Miracles of Mary are written in the upper margin of fols. 7v and 10v.
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ... “O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing ...” (fol. 10ra l.12-va)
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... “O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ...” (fol. 10va) (cp. ChRep no. 373)

- Sälam läki ʾo-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... “Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ...” (fols. 10vb-11rb).
The miracles of St. Mary in Text I-4a are numbered (from miracle 37 onwards by the same hand that wrote Additio 2).
Two miracles of Text I-4a are followed by a hymn.
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝm-betä mängǝśt wä-ʾǝm-betä kahǝnät... “O my Lady Mary, from the house of Kingdom and the house of Priesthood…” (fol. 7rb l. 9)
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam mälakotawit piläs zä-adḫǝnkiyo ʾǝm-kwǝnäne lä-aḥadu-mänäkos ... "O my Lady Mary, Divine Temple …" (fol. 17va-vb)
Text I-4a concludes with an extended supplication for the commissioners (subscriptio, fol. 115vb).

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. was resewn. Fols. 6r-7v were misplaced. Originally, fols. 8r-11v (quire II) were placed between fols. 5r-6v (quire I). The leather cover is partly detached from the back board; it has been cut off from the spine, probably to facilitate the resewing. The lower corner of fol. 93 is cut off. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 1, 3, 47, 73, 84, 86, 87, 104, 130. Fols. 1 and 3 are of different size and lighter colour.

list.item:
Fol. 2ra-va: Excerpt from Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah.Fol. 2ra: ወኢይምሰሎ፡ ለኵሉ፡ ክርስቲ[ያ]ናዊ፡ ቀሊለ፡ሰሚዓ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ እግዝእት፡ ማርያም፡ እስመ፡ ዓቢይ፡ ወክቡር፡ ውእቱ። … Fol. 2va: ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ለዘአጽሐፍዋ፡ ደቂቀ፡ አምደ፡ ሚካኤል።
The excerpt is followed by a note on commissioning the writing in the same hand. It mentions the “children of ʾAmdä Mikaʾel” as commissioners. The initial two lines of the excerpt and the name of Mary are rubricated.

Fol. 116rb: Excommunication against those who stole the book or erased its text.Fol. 116rb: ዘፈሐቆ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ… ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ስርናይ፡ ውእቱ፡ ዘአልቦ፡ ክርዳድ፡…
The note is followed by an exhortation.

- Fol. 134 contains the beginning of Text I-1 written in the main hand, probably a production error. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally: fols. 4rb, 6ra, 8rb, 26vb, 37va, 50va, 53rb, 58vb, 118rb, 119va, 121ra, 127va. - Tämälläs-signs (in the shape of +) indicating the place where the omissions, written interlineally (fol.10ra) or in the margins (fols. 9vb, 23rb, 63vb, 81va, 93vb, 96vba), belong. - Erasures are marked with crude lines: fols. 49vab, 58ra, 63rb, 104vb; with fine red lines: e.g., fols. 127ra, 128ra. - Erasures without marking: fols. 109ra, 121vb, 123va. - Scribbles: fol. 1rv.

person.persName: The following persons are mentioned as commissioners in the concluding supplication on fol. 115vb and in the supplication formulas of Texts I-1 to I-4a (hand a): Zä-Wäldä Maryam, ʾAmmǝḫa Giyorgis, Täklä Haymanot, Wäldä Kiros, Gäbrä ʾEwosṭatewos; also written over erasure on fols. 56rb, 76ra, 89rb. In addition, the names of ʾAmonyos (e.g., fols. 22ra, 47ra), Wäldä ʾArdǝʾǝt (e.g., fols. 45va, 47ra) and ʿAḍfä Krǝstos (e.g., fols. 54ra, 100ra) are given. Täklä Haymanot is mentioned also in supplication formulas of Text I-4b (in hand b).
